Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-5187 affecting package pytorch for versions less than 2.2.2-3
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-5187 affecting package pytorch for versions less than 2.2.2-3. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package pytorch is earlier than 2.2.2-3, affected by CVE-2024-5187
